North_Little_Rock.Darragh House: The Darragh House is a historic house at 2412 Broadway in Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a 1-1/2 story frame structure, its exterior finished in brick and stucco, with a side gable roof pierced by broad shed-roof dormers, giving it a Dutch Colonial feel. The roof hangs over a recessed porch, supported by oversized Tuscan columns.
